verses.verse: And you were <S%G3498>dead<s%> in your <S%G3900>trespasses<s%> and <S%G266>sins,<s%>

in <S%G3739>which<s%> you <S%G4218>formerly<s%> <S%G4043>walked<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G165>course<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1849>power<s%> of the <S%G109>air,<s%> of the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G1754>working<s%> in the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G543>disobedience.<s%>

<S%G1722>Among<s%> them we <S%G2532>too<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4218>formerly<s%> <S%G390>lived<s%> in the <S%G1939>lusts<s%> of our <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G4160>indulging<s%> the <S%G2307>desires<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and of the <S%G1271>mind,<s%> and were by <S%G5449>nature<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> as the <S%G3062>rest.<s%>
But <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> <S%G4145>rich<s%> in <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of His <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> He <S%G25>loved<s%> us,

<S%G2532>even<s%> when we were <S%G3498>dead<s%> in our <S%G3900>transgressions,<s%> <S%G4806>made<s%> us <S%G4806>alive<s%> <S%G4806>together<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ<s%> (by <S%G5485>grace<s%> you have <S%G1510>been<s%> <S%G4982>saved<s%>),
and <S%G4891>raised<s%> us up with Him, and <S%G4776>seated<s%> us with Him in the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> [places], in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

in <S%G2443>order<s%> that in the <S%G165>ages<s%> to <S%G1904>come<s%> He might <S%G1731>show<s%> the <S%G5235>surpassing<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of His <S%G5485>grace<s%> in <S%G5544>kindness<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> us in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
For by <S%G5485>grace<s%> you have been <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith;<s%> and that not of <S%G4771>yourselves,<s%> [it is] the <S%G1435>gift<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>
not as a <S%G1537>result<s%> of <S%G2041>works,<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> should <S%G2744>boast.<s%>

For we are His <S%G4161>workmanship,<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> for <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4282>prepared<s%> <S%G4282>beforehand,<s%> that we should <S%G4043>walk<s%> in them.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G3421>remember,<s%> that <S%G4218>formerly<s%> you, the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> who are <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G203>"Uncircumcision<s%>" by the so-called <S%G4061>"Circumcision,<s%>" [which is] <S%G5499>performed<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> by <S%G5499>human<s%> <S%G5499>hands<s%> â€“

[remember] that you were at that <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G5565>separate<s%> from <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G526>excluded<s%> from the <S%G4174>commonwealth<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel,<s%> and <S%G3581>strangers<s%> to the <S%G1242>covenants<s%> of <S%G1860>promise,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> and <S%G112>without<s%> <S%G112>God<s%> in the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

But <S%G3570>now<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> you <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4218>formerly<s%> were <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G3112>off<s%> have <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G1096>brought<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%> by the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

For He <S%G846>Himself<s%> is our <S%G1515>peace,<s%> who <S%G4160>made<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> [groups into] <S%G1520>one,<s%> and <S%G3089>broke<s%> <S%G3089>down<s%> the <S%G5418>barrier<s%> of the <S%G3320>dividing<s%> <S%G3320>wall,<s%>

by <S%G2673>abolishing<s%> in His <S%G4561>flesh<s%> the <S%G2189>enmity,<s%> [which is] the <S%G3551>Law<s%> of <S%G1785>commandments<s%> [contained] in <S%G1378>ordinances,<s%> that in <S%G846>Himself<s%> He might <S%G2936>make<s%> the <S%G1417>two<s%> into <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%> [thus] <S%G4160>establishing<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%>

and might <S%G604>reconcile<s%> them <S%G297>both<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> by it having <S%G615>put<s%> to <S%G615>death<s%> the <S%G2189>enmity.<s%>

And He <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G2097>preached<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%> to you <S%G3588>who<s%> were <S%G3112>far<s%> <S%G3112>away,<s%> and <S%G1515>peace<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who were <S%G1451>near;<s%>
for <S%G1223>through<s%> Him we <S%G297>both<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> our <S%G4318>access<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father.<s%>

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> you are <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>longer<s%> <S%G3581>strangers<s%> and <S%G3941>aliens,<s%> but you are <S%G4847>fellow<s%> <S%G4847>citizens<s%> with the <S%G40>saints,<s%> and are of God's <S%G3609>household,<s%>

having been <S%G2026>built<s%> upon the <S%G2310>foundation<s%> of the <S%G652>apostles<s%> and <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G1510>being<s%> the <S%G204>corner<s%> [stone],

in <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3619>building,<s%> being <S%G4883>fitted<s%> <S%G4883>together<s%> is <S%G837>growing<s%> into a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G3485>temple<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>
in <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> are being <S%G4925>built<s%> <S%G4925>together<s%> into a <S%G2732>dwelling<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>
